entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rankin Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:16 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -42.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rankin Inlet Airport 03:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -42.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -46.2°C
Wind: NW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 60 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 63 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
